sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: This document describes the specific tests to be carried out during the system test of the StationLoad component, used for the weather station(s) locatin(s) loading. The purpose of this component is to load station meta-data from STINFOSYS into the WDB system.

sect2.title: Purpose

listitem.para: Clarify the functionality/performance/accesibility requirements of the system
Clearly specify which tests must be passed for the component to be accepted for production
Document the consensus for the level of testing of the WDB

sect2.para: The tests set forth in this document are designed to satisfy the demands of two distinct stakeholders in the product; namely the end-users of the WDB and the operational maintenance department.

For each test, it must be defined who has the responsibility for performing the test. Any limitations with respect to the test must also be specified (e.g., for example if the test has yet to be implemented).

sect2.title: Controlling Document
sect2.para: The test specification and implemented tests in the StationLoad component follow the principles described in the WDB Test plan [1].

sect1.title: Compilation Test
sect1.para: There should be no warnings during the compilation or linking of the StationLoad component.

sect1.title: Unit Tests
sect1.para: At the moment there are no unit tests for the StationLoad component.

sect1.title: Performance Tests
sect1.para: At the moment rhere are no performance tests for the StationLoad component.
